getSecret

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSecret()
Retrieves the shared secret to the current user logged in

Specified by:
getSecret in interface AuthenticationService
Returns:
HTTP response with the OTP URI encoded in QRCode. For example: otpauth://totp/alice@google.com?secret=JBSWY3DPEHPK3PXP
